Rogers.Township 5, Benton County, Arkansas:
Township 5 is one of thirteen current townships in Benton County, Arkansas, USA. As of the 2010 census, its total population was 12,792.


== Geography ==
According to the United States Census Bureau, Township 5 covers an area of 4.460 square miles (11.55 km2); 4.452 square miles (11.53 km2) of land and 0.008 square miles (0.021 km2) of water.
